alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Judith Basin; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:12PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Dissipating thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Meagher, southern Judith Basin, and southeastern Cascade Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 211 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking dissipating thunderstorms along a line extending from 36 miles south of Belt to 16 miles southeast of White Sulphur Springs. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Neihart, Martinsdale, Sapphire Village, Checkerboard, Utica and Lennep. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 28 and 30. Highway 12 between mile markers 47 and 77. Highway 89 between mile markers 2 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building or other sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
